fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target two players, and lower their defense to None for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You __must__ use your ability every night, and you cannot target people you've targeted before until you've targeted everyone in the game at least once.
- If you cause someone to die, you will suicide of guilt.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive the game without having caused anyone's death.
